import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Cart({cart, setCart, isScrolled}) { const navigate = useNavigate(); function handleNavigate(id) { navigate(`/furnitures/${id}`); } return (

Order Summary

{cart.length !== 0 ? cart.map(item => { return (

Gaze Table

USD 15,000

Quantity

1

Remove Furniture

)}) :

No Items

}
) }
